page.title: 16NACTON HEATH SCHOOL,IPSWICH.
page.content: This school is an 11-16 High School and is the main school for teenages in the South-East of Ipswich. Following the introduction of Comprehensive education in the 1970's this school was a result of the joining together of two main schools, and even in 1985 has a split site.Only in two years will the pupils of this school share the same site on Nacton Road. The Landseer road site will close. Much renovation is going on to improve on the state of buildings,this has been made more necessary by a fire,early in 1985 which destroyed the school hall. The school has approximately 1,100 pupils and the site is adjacent to Priory Heath Infants School.
